attributes.action: take immediate action to protect us from gang related youth crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immediate action should be taken to protect families and individuals from the massive increase in knife and gun crime that is inflicting our communities. In particular:

1) MORE police and more EFFECTIVE policing methods

2) A court system that offers FAST and PUBLIC justice

3) SEVERE penalties 

4) LIFE TO MEAN LIFE for murderers

5) A REFERENDUM on the death penalty

6) RE-BALANCE human rights legislation in favour of law abiding individuals 

7) Abolish anonymity for youth offenders
